com.ualberta.cmput301w17t22.moodswing

Class FollowingController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ualberta.cmput301w17t22.moodswing.FollowingController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MSController

    public class FollowingController
extends java.lang.Object
implements MSController
    Controller for handling the Follower & Follwing part of participants that the mainParticipant interacts with.

    Created by nyitrai on 3/1/2017.

    Author:
    bbest

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FollowingController(MoodSwing ms)
      Constructor for FollowingController used to initiate following and follower actions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean approveRequest(Participant participant)
      Approves a pending request for a participant to follow the mainParticipant.
      boolean blockParticipant(java.lang.String participantUsername)
      The controller invokes the blockParticipant method from the main participant.
      void cancelRequest(Participant participant)
      Cancels the mainParticipant's follow request to the given participant.
      boolean declineRequest(Participant participant)
      Declines a pending request for a participant to follow the main participant.

      This method adds a participant to the pending list of followingList in the main participant.

      This method gets the given participant to stop following the main participant.

      The controller invokes the unblockParticipant method from the main participant.
      void unfollowParticipant(Participant receivingParticipant)

    • Constructor Detail

      • FollowingController

        public FollowingController(MoodSwing ms)
        Constructor for FollowingController used to initiate following and follower actions. As well blocking actions.
        Parameters:
        ms -

    • Method Detail

      • followParticipant

        public void followParticipant(java.lang.String participant)
        This method adds a participant to the pending list of followingList in the main participant. Controller calls upon the similar method in the Participant class.

        Then uses the elastic search controller to update both participants.

        Parameters:
        participant -

      • unfollowParticipant

        public void unfollowParticipant(Participant receivingParticipant)
        This method removes a participant from the mainParticipants followingList. Secondly it calls createUnfollowEvent() which sends an unfollow indicator to the receivingParticipant to invoke unfollowEvent to remove this participant form their followerList. Then updates both participants by using elastic search controller.
        Parameters:
        receivingParticipant -

      • stopParticipant

        public void stopParticipant(Participant participant)
        This method gets the given participant to stop following the main participant. Then updates both participants using the elastic search controller.
        Parameters:
        participant -

      • approveRequest

        public boolean approveRequest(Participant participant)
        Approves a pending request for a participant to follow the mainParticipant. Then updates both participants using the elastic search controller.
        Returns:
        true

      • declineRequest

        public boolean declineRequest(Participant participant)
        Declines a pending request for a participant to follow the main participant.
        Returns:
        true

      • cancelRequest

        public void cancelRequest(Participant participant)
        Cancels the mainParticipant's follow request to the given participant. Then updates both participants using the elastic search controller.
        Parameters:
        participant -

      • blockParticipant

        public boolean blockParticipant(java.lang.String participantUsername)
        The controller invokes the blockParticipant method from the main participant. Then updates participant using the elastic search controller.
        Parameters:
        participantUsername - The participant to block's username.
        Returns:

      • unblockParticipant

        public void unblockParticipant(java.lang.String participantUsername)
        The controller invokes the unblockParticipant method from the main participant. Then updates main participant using the elastic search controller.
